content: jelly bean baby socks a free design by susan b anderson ™ ™ spudandchloe com sweet yarns for real life ™ abbreviations k knit p purl s1 slip one stitch as if to purl k2tog knit two stitches together p2tog purl two stitches together ssk slip two stitches separately as if to knit knit the two slipped stitches together through the back loops cuff cast on 28 stitches placing 8 stitches on needles 1 and 2 and 12 stitches on needle 3 join to work in the round being careful not to twist the stitches place a stitch marker on the first stitch round 1 k2 p2 repeat to the end of the round repeat round 1 until the cuff measures 3 inches 4 inches 5 inches from the cast on edge heel flap divide the stitches as follows needle 1 14 sts size needles 2 and 3 7 sts each up to 1 yr 1-2 yrs 2-3 yrs work back and forth only on needle 1 for the heel flap as follows finished length of sock from the back of the heel to the toe row 1 s1 k1 repeat to the end of row 4 inches 5 inches 6 inches row 2 s1 p to the end of the row note foot size varies greatly in babies and toddlers the socks repeat row 1 and 2 four times repeat row 1 one more time you are very stretchy due to the rib and will fit a wide variety of sizes will have columns of 5 slipped stitches on the heel flap measuring the baby foot length is always best turn the heel yarn continue working on needle 1 only as follows spud & chloë sweater 55% superwash wool 45% organic row 1 s1 p7 p2tog p1 turn cotton 100 grams/160 yards 1 skein in jellybean #7513 or row 2 s1 k3 k2tog k1 turn 1 skein of any color in sweater row 3 s1 p to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 s1 k to 1 st before the gap k2tog k1 turn needles repeat row 3 and 4 until all of the stitches have been worked us size 7 double pointed needles set of 4 or size to obtain gauge on the last 2 row of the repeat you will end with a p2tog and a k2tog end with a row 4 8 sts remain tools scissors gusset ruler or tape measure continuing on with the working yarn and with the free dpn pick yarn needle up 5 stitches one stitch in each slipped stitch down the side of the stitch marker heel flap place the stitches from needle 3 onto needle 2 14 sts are on gauge needle 2 this is the top of the sock now work across in the rib 7 sts per inch in stockinette stitch pattern p2 k2 © 2012 this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the
